info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: classe-a-12.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Accept-Ranges: bytes Age: 302 Content-Type: text/html Date: Mon, 13 Sep 2021 03:19:16 GMT Etag: "8f7-5c351cdff5867-gzip" Last-Modified: Thu, 27 May 2021 15:56:39 GMT Server: Apache Vary: Accept-Encoding Via: 1.1 alproxy Classe à 12

geeknik
